title: Bubble
summaries: Bubbles are animated background furniture blocks, which have special behavior regarding liquids, interacting as if the Bubble was a solid block. When Bubbles are placed together in groups, they connect to make a larger Bubble or more complex structures.
Bubbles are purchased from the Party Girl for 2 each during Hardmode.
Grates function as the opposite of Bubbles, acting as solid blocks but allowing liquids to flow through.
